DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether pulsed electromagnetic fields(PEMF) is effective in the treatment of multiple chemical sensitivity in terms of life impact, symptoms, psychological distress, markers of central sensitization and the immune system, and quality of life.
DOC.brief_title: Pulsed Electromagnetic Fields for Multiple Chemical Sensitivity
